Reviews.Title: Poorly designed, barely functioning piece of junk stuffed with Microsoft and Toshiba garbage apps
Reviews.Author: OGI-MSTrbator
Reviews.Content: Pure garbage, do NOT buy this piece of junk, unless you want to spend hours and hours and hours trying to make it work.  I don't know who is a bigger villain here, Toshiba or Microsoft, pushing their half-baked and incompatible stuff out to consumers.  Obtaining an RMA to return this toad has not been successful so far.  After being a Dell user for years, I decided to give Toshiba a try, what a huge mistake!
